recipeIngredientRows.ingredientName: R JPN SPICY MAYO FOR SUSHI
recipeIngredientRows.purchaseProductName: R JPN SPICY MAYO FOR SUSHI
OIL, PAN COATING CANOLA AEROSOL SPRAY ALLERGEN FREE

recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
1. Prepare spicy pork per sub recipe. Hold at 135F or above.
 
2. Prepare spicy mayonnaise per sub recipe. Hold at 41F or below. 
 
3. Prepare avocado mayonnaise per sub recipe. Hold at 41F or below.
 
4. Prepare kimchi salad per sub recipe. Set aside. 
 
5. Prepare tomatillo salsa per sub recipe. Set aside.

1. Heat flat grill to medium high heat. 
 
2. Spray grill with vegelene. 
 
3. Heat tortilla approx. 10 seconds per side, or until tortilla is 
tender.

1. Layer 2 heated tortillas on top of each other in a serving plate or 
float boat.
 
2. Top tortillas with 2 tbsp spicy pork (approx. 1.5 oz). 
 
3. Top pork with 1/2 tspn spicy mayo, 1/2 tspn avocado mayo, 1 tspn 
kimchi, 1/2 tspn tomatillo salsa and 1/2 tspn fried shallots.
 
4. Serve hot.
